import React from "react"; import './summary.css'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Alert from "./delete_alert"; const SummaryPage = ({closeSum})=>{ const [viewAlert, setAlert] = useState(false); const [orderData, setOrderData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3004/order') .then(data => data.json()) .then((data) => setOrderData(data)) }, []) return( <>

  • Phone
  • {orderData.data.store_phone}
